House Bill/Resolution NO. HB03153
FULL TITLE : AN ACT TRANSFERRING THE ADMINISTRATIVE SUPERVISION AND OPERATIONAL CONTROL OF THE PHILIPPINE NATIONAL POLICE ACADEMY (PNPA), THE POLICE NATIONAL TRAINING INSTITUTE (PNTI), THE NATIONAL POLICE COLLEGE (NPC) AND THE NATIONAL FORENSIC SCIENCE TRAINING INSTITUTE (NFSTI) FROM THE PHILIPPINE PUBLIC SAFETY COLLEGE (PPSC) TO THE PHILIPPINE NATIONAL POLICE (PNP), AMENDING SECTIONS 24, 66 AND 67 OF REPUBLIC ACT NO. 6975 AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ALEJANO, GARY C.
DATE FILED : 2016-08-22
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Reform
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Deliberated upon by the Mother Committee on 2018-08-09
          -The Committee approved the motion to consolidate both measures, as well as the motion to make all Members present as co-authors.
      2. Draft of Substitute/Amended/Consolidated Measure prepared on 2018-08-13
      3. Draft of Committee Report and Attachments/Inquiries/Impeachment/Ethics Complaint prepared on 2018-08
      4. Transmittal memo prepared on 2018-08-15
      5. Measure approved by the Committee on 2018-08-28
          -On motion duly made, the Committee approved the substitute bill, as amended. The Committee likewise approved the motion to make all Members present, as co-authors.
      6. Scheduled for meeting/hearing on 2018-10-08
      7. Approved by the Committee on Appropriations on 2018-10-08
          -Unnumbered Substitute Bill to House Bills Numbered 3153 and 5787 was approved with amendment.
      8. Recommendations transmitted to the committee of referral on 2018-10-08
          -In its meeting held on 08 Oct 2018 at Speaker Nograles Hall, the Committee on Appropriations approved to report out the Substitute Bill on House Bills numbered 3153 and 5787, with amendments.
      9. Committee Report approved on 2018-11-21
      10. Committee Report filed on 2018-11-21
          -CR 938, HB08628
      11. Deliberated by the Conference Committee on 2019-01-14
      12. Conference Committee Report filed on 2019-01-23
